Description: Alujain Corp (known as: Alujain) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since August 1997. Alujain operates within the Materials sector focusing on Commodity Chemicals. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia and Bahrain, working on Diversified Capital Markets, Fertilizers and Agricultural Chemicals, Diversified Chemicals and Commodity Chemicals. Alujain is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in December 1991.
